Package com.csd4020.model.tiles.findings

Class Statue

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.csd4020.model.tiles.Tile
      • com.csd4020.model.tiles.FindingTile
        • com.csd4020.model.tiles.findings.Statue
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Caryatid, Sphinx
    public abstract class Statue
extends FindingTile
    An abstract class representing a Statue tile. A statue tile can either be a Sphinx or Caryatid tile.

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static int getNonMinMaxPlayerTilesPoints()
      Accessor function which returns the points that should be given to the players that have neither the most tiles nor the least.
      static int getPlayerWithMostTilesPoints()
      Accessor function which returns the points that should be given to the player with the most tiles.

      • Statue

        protected Statue​(java.lang.String statueCategory)
        "Constructor" for the StatueTile class used to initialize its attributes.
        Parameters:
        statueCategory - The statue's category Precondition: The statue's category must either be "Sphinx" or "Caryatid" Postcondition: The attributes of the class will be initialized.
